name: Hidden Objects - Mystery Venue
description:
Dive into a mysterious world in Hidden Objects - Secret Venue, a fun seek and find puzzle adventure game filled with word scenes, picture riddles, and mysterious items. The only way to solve the puzzles in this strange place is to find the items in each scene and collect them as quickly as you can. Words can't describe how unusual this world is. You'll just have to play and find out for yourself!

Secret Venue is filled with scenes that have strange items placed where they don't belong. Find these objects as quickly as you can if you want to solve the puzzle! There are three types of hidden item picture puzzles to complete: words lists, silhouettes, and standard picture-based seek and find scenes. The easiest levels include pictures of items to match against the background. Silhouette levels change things up and only show you the outline of the hidden objects, forcing you to guess what you're looking for. And words list levels are the toughest of all, as they only tell you what to find, you have to guess the shape!

It won't be easy to solve the puzzles in Mystery Venue. But it will definitely be fun! Seek and find items in every scene, then complete the riddle to show how smart you are!

Features:
- Play a hidden object mystery full of intense puzzles.
- Find every item on the list to move on to the next area.
- Three different types of stages: item pictures, outlines, and words lists.
- A handy map lets you quickly travel between areas.
- Fun for all ages!

How to Play:
- Look carefully at each screen and try to locate items on the list.
- Tap an item to collect it. Work fast for a better score.
- Use the map to navigate between levels.
- If you're stuck, you can buy hints to help you out.
